definition: to test/to put to the test/trial/ordeal
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father

sentences.english: It was immediately put to a severe test.
sentences.chinese: 它甫一問世便經歷嚴峻考驗。

sentences.english: To the life of the watershed, and in the test with the experience and to grasp.
sentences.chinese: 到了人生的分水嶺了，在考驗與歷練中去把握。

sentences.english: It in the test of whether we can fit the summer heat and winter cold.
sentences.chinese: 它在考驗我們是否能適合夏季的炎熱和冬季的寒冷。

sentences.english: China-ASEAN relations have withstood the test of crises and disasters.
sentences.chinese: 中國和東盟的關係經受住了風雨災禍的考驗。

sentences.english: Only after one's ideas have endured the test of time can they have vitality.
sentences.chinese: 一個人的觀點要經的起時間的考驗纔有生命力。

sentences.english: South Korea's fencers face their stiffest competition from the Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 韓國的擊劍手要面臨來自中國的最嚴峻考驗。

sentences.english: They are a test of your humanity.
sentences.chinese: 他們是對你人性的一種考驗。

sentences.english: Haba toys are a great choice that will stand the test of time.
sentences.chinese: 哈巴玩具是一個不錯的選擇，經得起時間的考驗。

sentences.english: This is really the acid test of forgiveness.
sentences.chinese: 這才真的是對寬恕之心的嚴峻考驗。

sentences.english: The test will be whether they can continue that streak.
sentences.chinese: 但能否延續這一強勁勢頭是他們所面臨的考驗。

sentences.english: 'This is a test case for the courts and their role in Thailand, ' says Mr. Panitan.
sentences.chinese: 帕尼坦說，這是對泰國法院及其職責的一大考驗。

sentences.english: The resolve of our nation is still being tested.
sentences.chinese: 我國的決心仍在經受考驗。

sentences.english: But many school-age children have not been tested.
sentences.chinese: 但許多適齡兒童沒有受到考驗。

sentences.english: Trials and adversity can be prepatory to a new life.
sentences.chinese: 考驗和逆境是新生的準備。

sentences.english: Max:Asking someone to buy a lottery ticket is challenging morality.
sentences.chinese: 請人代買彩券根本就是考驗人性。

sentences.english: Enjoy yourselves, because tomorrow morning comes the big ordeal.
sentences.chinese: 盡情歡樂吧，因爲明天早上你們將面對重大的考驗。

definition: after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
to attack/to batter/(of waves) to pound against/shock/impact
attitude (of the heart)/state of one's psyche/way of thinking/mentality
